formSubtitle: Tell us about yourself. Our AI will suggest the best PM Internship Scheme opportunities for you.
skillsPlaceholder: e.g., MS Office, Communication, English, Data Entry
interestsPlaceholder: e.g., Social Work, Farming, Technology, Healthcare

errorNoMatch: Our AI couldn't find a perfect match with the current criteria. Try broadening your skills or interests!
